title.narrative: PREVENTION AND PROTECTION SERVICES AGAINST VIOLENCE

UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Al 2025, las niÃ±as, niÃ±os y adolescentes en Argentina, especialmente aquellos en mayores condiciones de vulnerabilidad, vivirÃ¡n en entornos mÃ¡s seguros y protectores, y en caso de ser vÃ­ctimas de violencia o desprotecciÃ³n contarÃ¡n con una respuesta integral y acceso adecuado a la justicia.

related-activity.ref: 0240/A0/06/884 VIOLENCE-FREE ENVIRONMENTS, PROTECTION AND ACCESS TO JUSTICE

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Al 2025, las autoridades nacionales y de las provincias priorizadas mejoran su capacidad de ofertar servicios de fortalecimientofamiliar y cuidado comunitario; estrategias de sensibilizacion, prevencion y proteccion contra las violencias, incluida lapromocion de la denuncia; y estrategias de empoderamiento ciudadano para la demanda de servicios de proteccion y justicia, conenfoque de derechos, equidad y genero.

description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to the prevention of VAC (expanding the approach to other environments where it takes place) through evidence generation, capacity building and community awareness. CO achieved a reduction of child violent discipline methods within families and produced unprecedented national data on sexual violence against women during their childhood.;UNICEF also trained 713 workers for VAC detection in early childhood centers along with practical guidance to replicate the experience. Other relevant achievement was the expansion of the parenting program to the judiciary system of Buenos Aires City as a probation measure for offences related to mistreatment of children. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2022
